allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/The Soulstone Exchange/The Exchange/g; s/the Soulstone Exchange/the Exchange/g; s/<title>The Exchange/<title>The Exchange/g' "$file")
Bash(for faction in elves undead fae nomads exchange crucible bloodlines emergent)
Bash(jq '.equipment_items[] | select(.faction == """"church"""") | {name: .name, cards: [.cards[] | select(.damage >= 5) | {name: .name, damage: .damage, cost: .cost}]}' complete-card-data.json)
Bash(jq '.equipment_items[] | select(.faction == ""nomads"") | {name: .name, cards: [.cards[] | {name: .name, damage: .damage, cost: .cost}]}' complete-card-data.json)
Bash(jq '.equipment_items[] | select(.faction == ""crucible"") | {name: .name, cards: [.cards[] | select(.damage) | {name: .name, damage: .damage, cost: .cost}]}' complete-card-data.json)

Bash(jq -r '.equipment_items[] | .faction as $faction | .name as $item | .cards[] | select(.type | test(""""^[a-z]"""")) | """"\($faction) | \($item) | \(.name) | type: \(.type)""""' complete-card-data.json)

Bash(jq '.equipment_items[] | select(.faction == """"church"""") | {name: .name, cards: [.cards[] | select(.damage >= 6) | {name: .name, damage: .damage, cost: .cost, effect: .effect}]}' complete-card-data.json)
Bash(jq '.equipment_items[] | select(.faction == ""church"") | {name: .name, cards: [.cards[] | select(.damage >= 5) | {name: .name, damage: .damage, cost: .cost}]}' complete-card-data.json)
